languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, в системе присутствует корабль, принадлежащий к флоту Империума. Согласно телеметрии, судно сильно повреждено — предположительно выведено из строя большинство периферических обслуживающих систем. Хм... по данным авгуров, большая часть отсеков разгерметизирована, но есть данные о биосигнатурах в одном из внутренних технических отсеков, еще не покинутых машинными духами. Вероятно, там есть кто-то живой".

"Lord Captain, there is a voidship in the system that belongs to the Imperial Navy. According to telemetry, the ship is badly damaged — most of the peripheral service systems are presumably disabled. Hmm... according to the augurs, most of the compartments are depressurised, but there are biosignatures in one of the internal maintenance bays that the machine spirits have not yet abandoned. There might be somebody alive in there."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, в системе присутствует корабль, принадлежащий к флоту Империума. Согласно телеметрии, судно сильно повреждено — предположительно выведено из строя большинство периферических обслуживающих систем. Хм... по данным авгуров, большая часть отсеков разгерметизирована, но есть данные о биосигнатурах в одном из внутренних технических отсеков, еще не покинутых машинными духами. Вероятно, там есть кто-то живой".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, there is a voidship in the system that belongs to the Imperium. According to telemetry, the ship is badly damaged — most of the peripheral service systems are presumably disabled. Huh... according to the augurs, most of the compartments are depressurized, but there are biosignatures in one of the internal technical compartments that the machine spirits have not yet left. There might be somebody alive in there."

"Lord Captain, there is a voidship in the system that belongs to the Imperium. According to telemetry, the ship is badly damaged — most of the peripheral service systems are presumably disabled. Hmm... according to the augurs, most of the compartments are depressurised, but there are biosignatures in one of the internal maintenance bays that the machine spirits have not yet abandoned. languages.text: “舰长大人，这个星系中有一艘帝国海军虚空舰的残骸。遥测数据显示，那艘船受损严重，绝大部分外围伺服系统估计都已经失效了。嗯……扫描结果显示，绝大部分舱室都已经失压，但某个内部维护甲板依然散发着生物信号，那里的机魂也没有放弃求生希望。那片甲板上很可能还有活着的人。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is a voidship in the system that belongs to the Imperial Navy. According to telemetry, the ship is badly damaged — most of the peripheral service systems are presumably disabled. Hmm... according to the augurs, most of the compartments are depressurised, but there are biosignatures in one of the internal maintenance bays that the machine spirits have not yet abandoned. There might be somebody alive in there."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这个星系中有一艘帝国海军虚空舰的残骸。遥测数据显示，那艘船受损严重，绝大部分外围伺服系统估计都已经失效了。嗯……扫描结果显示，绝大部分舱室都已经失压，但某个内部维护模块依然散发着生物信号，那里的机魂也没有放弃求生希望。那个模块中很可能还有活着的人。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hay una nave del vacío de la Armada Imperial en el sistema. Según la telemetría, la nave ha sufrido graves daños. La mayoría de sistemas de servicio periféricos han fallado. Mmm... Según los augures, la mayoría de compartimentos ha perdido la presión, pero hay señales biológicas en una bahía de mantenimiento interna que los espíritus máquina no han abandonado. Podría haber supervivientes dentro».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is a voidship in the system that belongs to the Imperial Navy. According to telemetry, the ship is badly damaged — most of the peripheral service systems are presumably disabled. Hmm... according to the augurs, most of the compartments are depressurised, but there are biosignatures in one of the internal maintenance bays that the machine spirits have not yet abandoned. There might be somebody alive in there."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hay una nave del vacío de la Armada Imperial en el sistema. Según la telemetría, la nave ha sufrido graves daños. La mayoría de sistemas de servicio periféricos han fallado. Mmm... Según los augures, la mayoría de compartimentos ha perdido la presión, pero hay señales biológicas en un módulo de mantenimiento interno que los espíritus máquina no han abandonado. Podría haber supervivientes dentro».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, im System befindet sich ein Raumschiff der imperialen Kriegsflotte. Der Telemetrie zufolge ist das Schiff stark beschädigt ... der Großteil der peripheren Hilfssysteme ist vermutlich ausgefallen. Hmm ... laut den Auguren herrscht in den meisten Abteilungen kein Druck, aber es gibt Biosignaturen in einem der internen Wartungsmodule, die die Maschinengeister noch nicht aufgegeben haben. Da drin könnte noch jemand am Leben sein."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is a voidship in the system that belongs to the Imperial Navy. According to telemetry, the ship is badly damaged — most of the peripheral service systems are presumably disabled. Hmm... according to the augurs, most of the compartments are depressurised, but there are biosignatures in one of the internal maintenance bays that the machine spirits have not yet abandoned. There might be somebody alive in there."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, there is a voidship in the system that belongs to the Imperial Navy. According to telemetry, the ship is badly damaged — most of the peripheral service systems are presumably disabled. Hmm... according to the augurs, most of the compartments are depressurised, but there are biosignatures in one of the internal maintenance modules that the machine spirits have not yet abandoned. There might be somebody alive in there."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, un vaisseau spatial de la Marine Impériale croise dans le système. D'après les relevés télémétriques, il a subi de terribles avaries, et la plupart de ses systèmes secondaires sont certainement hors service. Hum... Selon les augures, presque tous les compartiments sont dépressurisés, mais nous détectons des biosignatures dans l'une des baies de maintenance que les esprits de la machine n'ont pas encore abandonnées. Il reste peut-être encore quelqu'un de vivant là-dedans. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is a voidship in the system that belongs to the Imperial Navy. According to telemetry, the ship is badly damaged — most of the peripheral service systems are presumably disabled. Hmm... according to the augurs, most of the compartments are depressurised, but there are biosignatures in one of the internal maintenance bays that the machine spirits have not yet abandoned. There might be somebody alive in there."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, un vaisseau spatial de la Marine Impériale croise dans le système. D'après les relevés télémétriques, il est gravement endommagé, et la plupart de ses systèmes secondaires sont certainement hors service. Hum... Selon les augures, presque tous les compartiments sont dépressurisés, mais nous détectons des biosignatures dans l'un des modules de maintenance que les esprits de la machine n'ont pas encore abandonnés. Il reste peut-être encore quelqu'un de vivant là-dedans. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この星系には帝国海軍に属するヴォイドシップが存在します。遠隔測定によれば、船はひどく損傷しており、周辺の補助システムの大半は機能停止しているものと思われます。そうですね……スキャナーの分析によれば、ほとんどの区画は減圧されていますが、内部メンテナンスベイのひとつにおいて、いまだ機械精霊が離れていない生命兆候が確認されています。中に生存者がいる可能性があります」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is a voidship in the system that belongs to the Imperial Navy. According to telemetry, the ship is badly damaged — most of the peripheral service systems are presumably disabled. Hmm... according to the augurs, most of the compartments are depressurised, but there are biosignatures in one of the internal maintenance bays that the machine spirits have not yet abandoned. There might be somebody alive in there."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この星系には帝国海軍に属するヴォイドシップが存在します。遠隔測定によれば、船はひどく損傷しており、周辺の補助システムの大半は機能停止しているものと思われます。そうですね……スキャナーの分析によれば、ほとんどの区画は減圧されていますが、内部メンテナンスベイのひとつにおいて、いまだ機械精霊が離れていない生命兆候が確認されています。中に生存者がいる可能性があります」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, sistemde İmparatorluk Donanması'na ait bir uçsuz gemisi var. Telemetriye göre gemi ağır hasar almış. Çevresel hizmet sistemlerinin çoğunun devre dışı olduğu varsayılabilir. Hımm... Alametlere göre kompartımanların çoğunun basıncı sıfırlanmış ancak makine ruhlarının henüz terk etmediği iç bakım bölmelerinin birinde biyosinyaller mevcut. Hayatta kalmış birileri olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is a voidship in the system that belongs to the Imperial Navy. According to telemetry, the ship is badly damaged — most of the peripheral service systems are presumably disabled. Hmm... according to the augurs, most of the compartments are depressurised, but there are biosignatures in one of the internal maintenance bays that the machine spirits have not yet abandoned. There might be somebody alive in there."
